ctfd.name: Blackbox attack Level 1
ctfd.message: Here's a CSV with 20 samples from the EMBER dataset. We have a hidden model trained on the complete EMBER dataset. Manipulate these to confuse our hidden model. The results should be a CSV within 0.1 units from the $L_infty$ norm from these and in the same order.

custom_flag_check.consolation_message: If you want help with this track, just ask a volunteer!
